menuItems.name: Hummingbird Pate
menuItems.info: Smallest of all avians, the critically endangered Hummingbird holds very little meat on its own. Scores must be caught before they can be enjoyed as a rich, creamy spread on a melba toast.

menuItems.name: Giraffe Neck Gyro
menuItems.info: The iconic neck of the giraffe makes it the tallest terrestrial animal in the world and, conveniently, a natural fit for a doner grill, resulting in succulently tender entree.
